description:
Grill and sizzle your way to dinner with this griddle plate. It sits on top of your campstove burner for even heat distribution and a reliable cooking surface. Non-stick for easy clean-up by whoever isn’t cooking.

  • Made of die-cast aluminum
  • Folding handle to pack it in your camp kit
  • Design channels fat away from your food
  • Fits the Primus® Tupike and most other 2-burner stoves
  • Dimensions are 19 x 17 x 1cm
name: Primus Campfire Griddle Plate
